title: Pulp Fiction
production_studio: Miramax, A Band Apart, Jersey Films
oscars_won_details: Best Writing, Screenplay Written Directly for the Screen
description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

title: Forrest Gump
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Leading Role
Best Writing, Screenplay Based on Material Previously Produced or Published
description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: The Lion King
description: A Lion cub crown prince is tricked by a treacherous uncle into thinking he caused his father's death and flees into exile in despair, only to learn in adulthood his identity and his responsibilities.

title: Léon: The Professional
description: Mathilda, a 12-year-old girl, is reluctantly taken in by Léon, a professional assassin, after her family is murdered. An unusual relationship forms as she becomes his protégée and learns the assassin's trade.

title: Natural Born Killers
description: Two victims of traumatized childhoods become lovers and psychopathic serial murderers irresponsibly glorified by the mass media.

title: Four Weddings and a Funeral
production_studio: Channel Four Films, PolyGram Filmed Entertainment
description: Over the course of five social occasions, a committed bachelor must consider the notion that he may have discovered love.

title: Speed
description: A young police officer must prevent a bomb exploding aboard a city bus by keeping its speed above 50 mph.

title: Dumb and Dumber
production_studio: New Line Cinema, Motion Picture Corporation of America
description: After a woman leaves a briefcase at the airport terminal, a dumb limo driver and his dumber friend set out on a hilarious cross-country road trip to Aspen to return it.

title: True Lies
description: A fearless, globe-trotting, terrorist-battling secret agent has his life turned upside down when he discovers his wife might be having an affair with a used-car salesman while terrorists smuggle nuclear war heads into the United States.

title: The Crow
description: A man brutally murdered comes back to life as an undead avenger of his and his fiancée's murder.

title: Clerks
description: A day in the lives of two convenience clerks named Dante and Randal as they annoy customers, discuss movies, and play hockey on the store roof.

title: Léon: The Professional
description: Mathilda, a 12-year-old girl, is reluctantly taken in by Léon, a professional assassin, after her family is murdered. An unusual relationship forms as she becomes his protégée and learns the assassin's trade.

title: Ed Wood
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
description: The story of the famously untalented director of 'Plan 9 from Outer Space' and his strange group of friends and collaborators.

title: Hoop Dreams
description: A film following the lives of two inner-city Chicago boys who struggle to become college basketball players on the road to going professional.

title: Quiz Show
description: A young lawyer, Richard Goodwin, investigates a potentially fixed game show. Charles Van Doren, a big time contestant, is the focal point of the investigation.

title: Three Colors: Red
description: A model discovers her neighbor is a retired judge who spies on his neighbors' phone calls.

title: Bullets Over Broadway
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Supporting Role
description: In 1920s New York, a struggling playwright is forced to cast a mobster's talentless girlfriend in his latest play in order to get it produced.

title: The Crow
description: A man brutally murdered comes back to life as an undead avenger of his and his fiancée's murder.

title: Little Women
description: The March sisters live and grow in post-Civil War America.

title: The Adventures of Priscilla, Queen of the Desert
production_studio: PolyGram Filmed Entertainment, Australian Film Finance Corporation (AFFC)
description: Two drag queens and a transgender woman travel across the desert to perform their unique style of cabaret.

title: The Hudsucker Proxy
description: A naive mailroom clerk is made the president of a manufacturing company as part of a stock scam.

title: The Madness of King George
production_studio: The Samuel Goldwyn Company, Channel Four Films
description: The story of King George III's slide into insanity, and the political and familial turmoil that ensued.

title: Nobody's Fool
description: An aging ne'er-do-well in a small New York town tries to reconnect with his estranged son and grandson.

title: Immortal Beloved
production_studio: Icon Entertainment International, Majestic Films International
description: The life and loves of the great composer Ludwig van Beethoven, as seen through the eyes of his secretary and biographer.

title: Nell
description: A young woman who has been raised in isolation in the Appalachian Mountains is discovered by a doctor and a psychologist.

title: Muriel's Wedding
description: A socially awkward young woman from a small Australian town dreams of having a glamorous wedding.

title: Heavenly Creatures
description: The true story of two teenage girls in 1950s New Zealand who form an intense and obsessive friendship, and their fantasies lead them to commit a shocking murder.

title: The Mask
production_studio: New Line Cinema, Dark Horse Entertainment
description: Bank clerk Stanley Ipkiss is transformed into a manic superhero when he wears a mysterious mask.

title: Clear and Present Danger
description: CIA analyst Jack Ryan is drawn into an illegal war fought by the US government against a Colombian drug cartel.

title: Maverick
description: Bret Maverick, needing money for a poker tournament, faces various comic mishaps and challenges, including a charming woman thief.

title: Interview with the Vampire: The Vampire Chronicles
description: A vampire tells his epic life story: love, betrayal, loneliness, and hunger.

title: Legends of the Fall
description: The story of three brothers and their father living in the remote wilderness of Montana in the early 20th century and how their lives are affected by nature, history, war, and love.

title: The Client
description: A young boy who witnessed the suicide of a mafia lawyer hires an attorney to protect him from the mob and the authorities.

title: Wes Craven's New Nightmare
description: A demonic force has chosen Freddy Krueger as its portal to the real world. Can Heather Langenkamp play the part of Nancy one last time and trap the evil trying to enter our world?

title: Blue Sky
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Leading Role
description: The wife of an Army officer in the 1960s has a mental breakdown and is sent to an institution.
